articles.title: Trump to bring back presidential physical fitness test canceled by Obama - The Washington Post
articles.description: Trump signed an executive order resurrecting the presidential fitness test, which for decades pushed America’s children to do 40 push-ups, 10 pull-ups and a 6.5-minute mile.
articles.content: President Donald Trump signed an executive order on Thursday alongside a coterie of current and retired professional athletes to bring the presidential fitness test back to U.S. schools a national te… [+3738 chars]
